column1: So everyone traded or not traded in the name of corona virus?

Flight from Bangalore to Kochi. A white lady was wearing mask and wiping the tray table in front of her with tissue. Seeing this a girl sitting near her asked ,"r u corona infected?" The foreigner got stunned. The girl said,"I saw u r cleaning surface after touching with hands"!
Our government is busy fighting a bigger virus than corona! The creators of that virus are crying fowl that govt is not acting. What an irony!

Meanwhile screenings in India for passengers from Nepal means people must plan for flights with longer transit time. No one outside Nepal thinks we are "Corona Free". Neither will they believe such bogus.

For a young Minister, we seem to have got the worst and most clueless in Yogesh Bhattarai thinking any country can be declared "Corona Free" just yet. Meanwhile he has no plans for how to manage risks from Korea, Singapore etc.#getserious #coronavirus #pandemic @nepaltourismb
Spotted in the #Kochi metro today. It’s been amazing to see how #kerala has been dealing with #corona #coronavirusindia #coronakerala #kerala – at Elamkulam

After the outbreak of the coronavirus, Malayali students who have returned from China are taken to a hospital for screening from Cochin International Airport. . . . #coronavirus #corona #kochi #kerala #india #china… https://www.instagram.com/p/B8S3-HkjeOa/?igshid=4jev9pt79zij
Why all 3 coronovirus cases in India now are from Kerala | The News Minute #coronavirus #Corona
Those aren't dead bodies.. Looks like people sleeping in bags or something. If those people were dead from Corona, this dude wouldn't be shooting there and people sitting there.

Corona didn't come to Kerala because we eat non veg.. We have students all over the world, that includes China as well. Plus, we have the equipment and staff capable of isolating people. Hence we detected Corona. Unlike in BIMARU people die every year from unknown illnesses.
Saudi Arabia should pray instead of banning pilgrimage. #COVID-19 #coronavirus
